mapper.insert: INSERT INTO content(name, description, attractions_no) VALUES(#{name}, #{description}, #{attractionNo})
mapper.update:
UPDATE content
name = #{name},
description = #{description},
attraction_no = #{attractionNo},
WHERE content_id = #{contentId}
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, proposal_id, group_id, no, title, content_type_name, first_image1, first_image2, latitude, longitude, tel, addr1, addr2, homepage, overview FROM schedule_proposal sp JOIN attractions a ON (sp.attractions_no = a.no) JOIN contenttypes c USING (content_type_id) WHERE group_id=#{groupId}
